name: Gendou Ringo
desc: A shrine maiden from the Grand Narukami Shrine.

customize.name: Chitose
customize.desc: A code name of a Shuumatsuban agent, also known as Momoyo.

customize.text: Chitose, a Shuumatsuban agent, used to work undercover as Gendou Ringo. Later, she faked her death to lure the Fatui.

customize.name: Lyudochka Snezhevna
customize.desc: A former Fatuus who started a new life in Inazuma.

customize.text: Lyudochka infiltrated the Grand Narukami Shrine after Chitose left. With the Traveler's help, she faked her death to leave the Fatui and start a new life as a shrine maiden.

customize.name: Fortune Slip
customize.desc:
A special slip of paper that can illuminate one's fortune. Also known to a certain someone as "strips of paper."
You can only get one of these per day, which will cause the previous day's fortune slip to lose meaning and disappear.
They say that slips that portend ill luck such as "Misfortune" and "Great Misfortune" can be tied to the Fortune Slip Hanger as a prayer for a turnaround.
Regardless, "fate" and "destiny" are things best grasped and forged in one's own hands.

customize.name: Special Fortune Slip
customize.desc:
A specially made fortune slip that describes how your luck will be like today. There is nothing different about this Fortune Slip, save for the fact that you got it for the fake Bamboo Slip.
Whose fortune does this Fortune Slip describe?

customize.name: Strange Fortune Slip
customize.desc: A special slip that can only be obtained if you use a certain secret code while exchanging for a Fortune Slip. Indicates a target and the location where they will emerge.
